channel.title: Wrong Magic Bow Spec?

item.title: Wrong Magic Bow Spec?
item.dc:creator: @huiho huiho
item.description:
@huiho wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && specialAmount > 24 && specOn && AttackingOn2.currentHealth > 0){ specialAtk(true, 25, 256, 1074); hitDiff = misc.random(maxRangeHit()) + misc.random(3); rangeGFX(75, 249); rangeGFX(95, 249); specAttack(); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); usingSpecial = true; }

Is this correct, because on my server, when someone tries to use the mage bow spec, it doesnt workâ€¦
